backend/main.mo: Motoko canister actor implementing an in-memory map of records keyed by text, with APIs to add, fetch, list, and count records and trap on duplicates or missing keys.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level product features to frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for reconciliation-related functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files, describing their roles in upload, parsing, reconciliation, results display, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining light and dark themes, design tokens, and color variables for the data-tool UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing the app layout, header/footer, and tab navigation between Upload and Results while managing reconciliation state.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/configVa: Validates reconciliation configuration by ensuring key columns for all sheets and compare columns are selected.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/excelPar: Parses .xlsx files using XLSX to extract headers and normalized row data from a specified sheet, and provides a helper to list sheet names.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/exportXl: Exports reconciliation results to a formatted Excel file with a summary section and detailed comparison rows.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/fileVali: Validates uploaded Excel files by checking file extension, expected sheet name, and required column headers based on template specs.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/normaliz: Provides helpers to normalize cell values and build composite reconciliation keys from selected columns.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/PreviewT: Reusable component that displays a scrollable preview table of the first N rows of a parsed Excel sheet.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/Reconcil: UI panel for selecting key columns per sheet and common comparison columns, then triggering reconciliation with the chosen configuration.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/reconcil: Implements the core reconciliation algorithm to compare three parsed sheets, detect matches, mismatches, missing records, and duplicates, and produce summary statistics.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/ResultsT: Results view showing reconciliation summary metrics, a filterable/searchable results table, row detail dialog, and Excel export functionality.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/template: Defines template specifications for sheets A, B, and C, including expected sheet names, filenames, and required headers.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/types.ts: Contains shared TypeScript types for parsed sheets, reconciliation configuration, result rows, statuses, and overall results.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/UploadTa: React UI for uploading and validating three Excel files (A, B, C), previewing parsed data, configuring reconciliation, and running local reconciliation with error/loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers and sets a full OKLCH-based CSS variable color system for light and dark themes, plus global body and border styling.
frontend/src/lib/xlsx.ts: Provides TypeScript interfaces and a safe wrapper for the SheetJS XLSX library, including dynamic CDN loading and helper accessors for reading and writing Excel files.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Frontend entry point that creates the React root, applies global providers (React Query and Internet Identity), and renders the App with Tailwind styles loaded.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, plugins, and an extended theme with custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, layout, animations, and component styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the appâ€™s purpose (Excel reconciliation tool) and tracking implemented features, versions, and pending feature requests.
